title: RaiseEvent (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL RaiseEvent
Raise an event related to a change of value or eventually change of flags of the given datapoint.
An instance of RaiseEvent allows to represent an instance of a datapoint of DNP3 object of groups
2 âbinary input eventâ
4 âdouble-bit input eventâ
11 âbinary output eventâ
22 âbinary counter eventâ
23 âfrozen counter eventâ
32 âanalog input eventâ
33 âfrozen analog input eventâ
42 âanalog output eventâ
111 âoctet string eventâ
The DNP3 object group of the event to raise results from the DNP3 object group of the given point.
For example: an instance of BinaryInput does relate to DNP3 object group 1 âbinary inputsâ,
and so using RaiseEvent for such an instance of BinaryInput does raise an DNP3 object group 2 âbinary input eventâ.

rows.Name: xExecute
rows.Comment: Raise event at rising edge (xExecute FALSE â> TRUE).

rows: The point for which to raise the event.
